description: A behavior that enables a mob to transport items from and to containers.

allow_simultaneous_interaction.description: When true the mob will wait until a container is not used by other entities before starting to interact with it. Default value: false.

allowed_items.description: A list of item descriptors that are the only items the mob is allowed to transport. If this and "disallowed_items" are both empty, then all items are allowed. If non-empty "disallowed_items" must be empty. Default value: empty.

destination_container_types.description: A list of block descriptors that should be a container type to put items in. Default value: empty.

disallowed_items.description: A list of item descriptors that are the mob is not allowed to transport. If non-empty "allowed_items" must be empty. Default value: emtpy.

idle_cooldown.description: When the mob cannot find a container in which to get or put items, the goal will stop being active for this amount of time in seconds. Default value: 20.

initial_cooldown.description: How long the mob will wait after spawning or getting the goal added before the goal can start. Default value: 0.

interaction_time.description: The amount of time in seconds spent interacting with the containers. Default value: 3.

max_stack_size.description: The maximum stack size that the mob will try to take from a container. Default value: 64.

max_visited_containers.description: The maximum number of containers that the mob will try to take/place items from before going on cooldown and starting over. Default value: 16.

place_strategy.description: The strategy to use for placing the transported item. Any - always place if there is room, With matching - place if there is a matching item in the container, With matching or empty - like With matching but will also place in empty containers Default value: any.
place_strategy.title: place_strategy

search_distance.description: The maximum search distance horizontally and vertically at which to find containers for taking or placing items. Default value: Vec2(64,32).

search_strategy.description: The strategy to use for finding source or destination containers. The nearest valid container or a random valid container in range. Default value: random.
search_strategy.title: search_strategy

source_container_types.description: A list of block descriptors that should be a container type to get items from. Default value: empty.

title: minecraft:behavior.transport_items
